item.title: A Makefile For Go Projects
item.description: I like using a Makefile in my Go projects. These are some tasks that I find useful in pretty much all of them.

item.title: A Result Type For Typescript
item.description: a Result type is an abstraction to communicate the outcome of fallible operations. In the JS world, we are probably more used to throwing errors, but this approach has its advantages, especially in message-based communication.

item.title: Utility To Deal With Secrets In TS
item.description: If your code deals, at one point or another, with secrets in plain text, it might be a good idea to prevent accidental logging of such sensitive information.

item.title: Utility To Deal With Secrets In Go
item.description: If your code deals, at one point or another, with secrets in plain text, it might be a good idea to prevent accidental logging of such sensitive information.
